item.title: 奇货可居：纳西姆-塔勒布谈如何过上美好生活（播客）
item.description: 每天，我们都会被各种看似不可思议的头条新闻淹没。多场大规模战争仍在继续。政治反复无常。市场搅乱了每个人的大脑。那么，我们应该如何生活并感觉良好？我们应该如何看待我们周围的世界，以及各种可感知的风险。在上个月于纽约举行的 "奇货可居 "特别节目直播中，我们采访了著名作家纳西姆-尼古拉斯-塔勒布（Nassim Nicholas Taleb），他是 Universa 投资公司的科学顾问。【原文：Every day we’re inundated with headlines that are seemingly unbelievable. Multiple major wars are ongoing. Politics is erratic. Markets are scrambling everyone’s brains. So how should we live and feel good? How should we think about the world around us, and the various perceived risks out there. In yet another episode from our live Odd Lots special in New York City last month, we speak with famed author Nassim Nicholas Taleb, the scientific adviser at Universa Investments, who shares his perspec】

item.title: 在新欧洲债券等级体系中，法国收益率超过意大利
item.description: 持续存在的政治风险已将法国五年期债券推向欧元区最高收益率的边缘，现在人们的注意力正转向十年期债券的利率多快也会出现同样的情况。【原文：Lingering political risks have pushed French five-year bonds to the brink of becoming the highest-yielding in the euro region, and attention is now turning to how soon the rates on 10-year securities will do the same.】

item.title: 简街印度交易赚取数十亿美元背后的秘密
item.description: 从阿姆斯特丹到香港和纽约，它已成为城中的热门话题：一种独特的衍生品战略在印度赚得盆满钵满。【原文：From Amsterdam to Hong Kong and New York, it had become the talk of the town: A unique derivatives strategy fabulously profitable in India.】

item.title: 日本个人持股量创历史最大增幅
item.description: 上一财年，随着日本免税 NISA 储蓄计划的扩大以及人们能够投资更小金额的资金，日本个人持股数量激增 12%，达到 8360 万股，创下新纪录。【原文：The number of individual shareholdings in Japan surged 12% to a fresh record of 83.6 million last fiscal year as the country’s tax-free NISA savings program expanded and people were able to invest smaller amounts of money.】

item.title: 监管机构为何要打击印度庞大的期权市场？
item.description: 印度在短短五年内就从高度投机的股票衍生品市场的小角色跃升为全球最大的市场。目前，包括期权交易在内的市场日交易额约为 3 万亿美元。【原文：India has gone from being a small player in the highly speculative equity derivatives market to the world’s largest, all within just five years. Daily turnover in the market – which includes options trading – now sits at about $3 trillion.】

item.title: 通胀加速加剧捷克央行的谨慎态度
item.description: 捷克 6 月份的通胀加速，达到今年以来的最快速度，支持了决策者的谨慎态度，限制了进一步降息的空间。【原文：Czech inflation accelerated in June to the fastest pace this year, supporting policymakers’ cautious approach and limiting room for further interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 中欧关系恶化，中国对欧盟白兰地征收反倾销税
item.description: 中国对欧洲白兰地征收为期五年的反倾销税，两个贸易伙伴之间的外交和贸易紧张局势升级。【原文：China imposed anti-dumping duties on European brandy for five years, as diplomatic and trade tensions escalate between the two trading partners.】

item.title: 德意志银行和 SeaTown 加入 VinFast 价值 5.1 亿美元的私人债务项目
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德意志银行和 SeaTown Holdings International 是向 VinFast Auto Ltd. 提供 5.1 亿美元私人信用贷款的贷款方之一。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG and SeaTown Holdings International are among the lenders providing a $510 million private credit loan to VinFast Auto Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 简街受限后印度经纪公司和交易所股价下跌
item.description: 在美国公司被暂时禁止进入印度证券市场后，印度历史最悠久的证券交易所和一家与 Jane Street Group LLC 有关联的经纪公司股价下跌。【原文：Shares of India’s oldest stock exchange and a brokerage linked to Jane Street Group LLC fell after the US firm was temporarily barred from the nation’s securities market.】

item.title: 德意志银行、汇丰银行和 SeaTown 将加入 Vingroup 的 Vincom 零售贷款计划
item.description: 据知情人士透露，越南企业集团 Vingroup JSC 旗下的 Vincom Retail JSC 已收到 2.4 亿美元私人信用贷款的承诺。【原文：Vincom Retail JSC, a unit of Vietnamese conglomerate Vingroup JSC, has received commitments for its $240 million private credit loan, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国股票投资者耐心渐失，收益仍遥遥无期
item.description: 英国工党在大选中大获全胜，为投资者带来了稳定的政治局面和诱人的投资机会，但时隔一年，英国国内的各种斗争仍在困扰着英国的股票市场。【原文：A year after a sweeping Labour Party election victory promised UK political stability and attractive opportunities for investors, Britain’s domestic struggles still dog its equity market.】

item.title: 德意志银行称西班牙将继续跑赢欧元区同行
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）称，在通胀和借贷成本缓解之后，西班牙经济的增长速度将继续超过欧元区。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG said the Spanish economy will keep outpacing the euro area’s growth after inflation and borrowing costs eased.】

item.title: 陷入困境的建筑商 Parkview 考虑出售艺术品偿还债务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港建筑商侨福集团正在考虑出售价值超过 2 亿港元（约合 2550 万美元）的艺术品，以偿还债务并帮助获得与北京最具标志性的建筑群之一有关的再融资交易。【原文：Hong Kong builder Parkview Group is considering selling artwork worth over HK$200 million ($25.5 million) to pay down debt and help secure a refinancing deal linked to one of Beijing’s most iconic complexes, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 匈牙利工业因电池问题萎缩超预期
item.description: 周五的数据显示，由于电池生产的疲软继续拖累制造业，匈牙利正在努力扭转工业部门的颓势。【原文：Hungary is struggling to turn its industrial sector around, data showed Friday, as weakness in battery production continues to pull back manufacturing.】

item.title: 安哥拉柴油价格上调33%，今年第三次上调
item.description: 安哥拉当局在国际货币基金组织的鼓励下，大力削减燃料补贴，将柴油价格提高了33%，这是安哥拉今年第三次提高柴油价格。【原文：Angola raised the diesel price by 33%, the third increase this year as authorities press ahead with fuel-subsidy cuts that have been encouraged by the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 美元疲软冲击资产，GPIF 季度亏损 610 亿美元
item.description: 由于美元贬值拖累其海外证券价值，加上国内资产下滑，日本政府养老金投资基金出现季度亏损。【原文：Japan’s Government Pension Investment Fund suffered a quarterly loss as a depreciating dollar dragged down the value of its overseas securities and domestic assets slumped.】

item.title: 美国贸易谈判进入最后阶段，德国工厂订单下滑
item.description: 德国工厂订单四个月来首次下降，原因是国内企业对在与美国贸易的不确定性解决之前进行大规模投资持谨慎态度。【原文：German factory orders dropped for the first time in four months as businesses at home were wary of committing to large investments before uncertainty over trade with the US is resolved.】

item.title: 大英图书馆首席执行官："每一代人都有恐慌的阶段
item.description: 比起强调扫盲和人工智能，丽贝卡-劳伦斯更关注如何获得新的资金和应对网络攻击的后果。【原文：Rebecca Lawrence is more focused on securing new funding and dealing with the aftermath of a cyberattack than stressing about literacy and AI.】

item.title: 拉加德告诉德国之声：欧洲央行利率状况良好，致力于实现 2% 的目标
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）对德国广播公司（ARD）表示，欧洲中央银行目前的利率立场是适当的，该机构将全力实现 2% 的通胀目标。【原文：The European Central Bank current interest-rate position is appropriate and the institution is fully committed to its 2% inflation target, President Christine Lagarde told ARD.】

item.title: 印尼看到 "大胆 "的美国贸易协议，提出大幅削减关税
item.description: 印尼首席谈判代表表示，印尼有信心在即将到来的关税最后期限之前与美国达成一项 "大胆 "的贸易协议，该协议将涵盖关键矿产、能源、国防合作和市场准入等领域。【原文：Indonesia is confident it is close to securing a “bold” trade deal with the US that will span critical minerals, energy, defense cooperation and market access ahead of the looming tariff deadline, according to the nation’s chief negotiator.】

item.title: 台湾考虑对购买股票的外国人实施更严格的外汇管理规定
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，台湾央行正在就收紧外国股票投资者购买货币的计划征求反馈意见，此举可能会在今年本币飙升之后限制投机性押注。【原文：Taiwan’s central bank is seeking feedback on a plan to tighten currency purchases by foreign stock investors, according to people familiar with the matter, a move that may limit speculative bets after a surge in the local dollar this year.】

item.title: 台湾考虑对购买股票的外国人实施更严格的外汇管理规定

韩国敦促 SK 电讯公司就数据泄露事件免收退出费
item.description: 韩国当局表示，SK 电讯公司应免除受数据泄露事件影响的约半数韩国人口想要离开网络的用户的费用。【原文：South Korean authorities said SK Telecom Co. should waive fees for users who want to leave the network following a data breach that affected about half the country’s population.】

item.title: 法航荷航开始收购 SAS 的主要控制权
item.description: 法航荷航（Air France-KLM）将启动程序，将其在斯堪的纳维亚航空公司 SAS AB 的少数股权增至 60.5%，以扩大欧洲航空业的整合，更好地与竞争对手德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）和英国航空公司（British Airways）的所有者 IAG SA 竞争。【原文：Air France-KLM will initiate the process of raising its minority stake in Scandinavian airline SAS AB to 60.5%, as it looks to extend consolidation in the European aviation industry and better compete with rivals Deutsche Lufthansa AG and British Airways owner IAG SA.】

item.title: 欧洲央行警告热浪对通胀和经济增长的影响
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员弗兰克-埃尔德森认为，热量与通货膨胀和国内生产总值等关键经济指标之间的联系非常重要，不容忽视。【原文：The link between heat and key economic indicators such as inflation and gross domestic product is too important to ignore, according to European Central Bank Executive Board member Frank Elderson.】

item.title: 泰国证券交易所寻求提高流动性以缓解股价波动
item.description: 随着政治动荡的加深对投资者信心造成压力，泰国证券交易所运营商将研究各种措施来支持市场。【原文：Thailand’s stock exchange operator will look at various measures to support the market as a deepening political turmoil weighs on investor confidence.】

item.title: 韩国贸易代表寻求推迟关税期限
item.description: 韩国最高贸易官员将于本周末访问美国，并提出新的建议，希望在最后一刻推迟在更高关税生效前迫在眉睫的谈判期限。【原文：South Korea’s top trade official will visit the US this weekend with fresh proposals in a last-minute bid to delay a looming deadline for negotiations before higher tariffs are scheduled to kick in.】

item.title: 中国占美国进口份额降至 7%，越南紧追其后
item.description:
特朗普的关税措施已将货物从中国转移到东南亚 

Trumps’ tariffs have shifted shipments from China to Southeast Asia 

】
